definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to be unable to hold back

sentences.english: If the person interrogated refuses to sign his name or press down his fingerprint, it shall be indicated in the notes.
sentences.chinese: 對被盤問人拒絕簽名和捺指印的，應當在筆錄上註明。

sentences.english: Tenants have often complained about being "under the thumb of the landlord."
sentences.chinese: 房客常抱怨他們“被捺在房東的拇指之下”。

sentences.english: Any revision of an inquiry transcript shall be confirmed by the inquired parties, with their seals or fingerprints affixed thereto .
sentences.chinese: 筆錄中修改處應當由被詢問人蓋章或者捺指印認可。

sentences.english: The detainee's refusal to sign or press down his fingerprint shall be indicated in the Detainment Decision.
sentences.chinese: 被扣留人拒不簽字或者捺指印的，應當予以註明。

sentences.english: He must learn to control his temper.

definition: bristles lying down (brush movement in painting)
vertical stroke with a hook at the end (in Chinese characters)
against the bristles (brush movement in painting)
variant of 筆畫|笔画[bi3 hua4]
horizontal stroke with a hook at the end (in Chinese characters)
to walk (side part of split character)
